experience.title: Sr. Vice President
experience.description: â€¢	Responsible for Business Development across channels PAN India/International Operations.â€¢	Developing a strategy and plan for a modernized customer data mart aimed at consolidating enterprise and third party data for use in customer analytics, digital user experience and personalization and Retail clienteling.â€¢	Identifying new areas for the potential business accordingly & to appoint investors and business partners.â€¢	Providing leadership for 40+ staff (including VP's, GM &  Sr. Managers) and over 200+ consultants as I deliver the strategic planning and approach for Business Development, E Commerce , Distribution ,SIS , Digital and Business Intelligence applications, International Business.â€¢	Presentation on the projections of sales and Return of Investment (ROI) and turnover for new partners/franchise.â€¢	Identifying locations/ areas to open business opportunities, keeping in mind over all plans of the company.â€¢	Co-ordination with legal department to finalize agreements and relevant documentation.â€¢	Strategic identification of new sites and availability of location/properties in the identified catchment areas for brand expansion with viable models.â€¢	Negotiation & finalization of commercials with developers / owners / consultants and registration of the finalized location/properties. â€¢	Due diligence of property/Business partner along with necessary commercial & legal clearances.â€¢	Finding new business development avenues for national and international Business.â€¢	Co-ordination with internal departments to hand over the sites to Projects team well in time.â€¢	Responsible for developing new relationships in the zone for new growth & business opportunities.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Responsible for Business Development across channels PAN India/International Operations.â€¢ Developing a strategy and plan for a modernized customer data mart aimed at consolidating enterprise and third party data for use in customer analytics, digital user experience and personalization and Retail clienteling.â€¢ Identifying new areas for the potential business accordingly & to appoint investors and business partners.â€¢ Providing leadership for 40+ staff (including VP's, GM & Sr. Managers) and over 200+ consultants as I deliver the strategic planning and approach for Business Development, E Commerce , Distribution ,SIS , Digital and Business Intelligence applications, International Business.â€¢ Presentation on the projections of sales and Return of Investment (ROI) and turnover for new partners/franchise.â€¢ Identifying locations/ areas to open business opportunities, keeping in mind over all plans of the company.â€¢ Co-ordination with legal department to finalize agreements and relevant documentation.â€¢ Strategic identification of new sites and availability of location/properties in the identified catchment areas for brand expansion with viable models.â€¢ Negotiation & finalization of commercials with developers / owners / consultants and registration of the finalized location/properties. â€¢ Due diligence of property/Business partner along with necessary commercial & legal clearances.â€¢ Finding new business development avenues for national and international Business.â€¢ Co-ordination with internal departments to hand over the sites to Projects team well in time.â€¢ Responsible for developing new relationships in the zone for new growth & business opportunities.

experience.title: Summer Trainee
experience.description: Roorkee engineering - 30 year old Ancillary of BHEL Haridwar and ISGEC Yamunanagar , as Business development officer.Account handling: Tenders and negotiations for getting appropriate business from BHEL, ISGEC & other accounts.Day to Day operations: Managing business, systems and operations on day to basis.Manpower management: Mid Size Company with 2 shifts a day and 52 line men.Core Competencies Business Development: Overseeing marketing and Dealer Development operations for achieving increased growth & top-line profitability and initiating market development efforts.Planning & Budgeting: Formulating long term/short term strategic plans/ activities to enhance operations in coordination with macro plans of organization & the industry trends.Channel Sales Management: Developing and appointing dealers to expand product reach in the market and mentoring the sales team (both in-house and dealerships) for effective functioning & accomplishment of individual & team goals.Market Research: Conducting market research activities, tracking competitor's moves and providing valuable inputs to the top management for fine tuning the sales and marketing strategies. Training ProgramsAttended various training programs such as:Management Development Programme (Volkswagen)Dealer Development (Honda CI norms).Sales Process (Honda and castrol).Honda Marketing and Management Seminar.HSSE Training at British petroleum (Health, safety, security and environment).Management Training Undergone; Objective:   Marketing Research on Customers and Employee Satisfaction  .

Training ProgramsAttended various training programs such as:Management Development Programme (Volkswagen)Dealer Development (Honda CI norms).Sales Process (Honda and castrol).Honda Marketing and Management Seminar.HSSE Training at British petroleum (Health, safety, security and environment).Management Training Undergone; Objective: Marketing Research on Customers and Employee Satisfaction .
